channel.title: DepositAll script
channel.description: My own deposit all script, that really does deposit all, not just most like the old one. [scar]procedure DepositAll; begin if (BankScreen) then fixchat begin repeat begin Deposit(1,28,2) end until(invcount=0 or IsChatMessage('any more items in the bank.')) end if IsChatMessage('any more items in the bank.') then writeln('Uhoh, youre out of bank space!') end; [/scar]

item.title: DepositAll script
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

And once again, here is the CLEAN code: [scar]procedure DepositAll;
begin
if (BankScreen) then
begin
fixchat;
repeat
Deposit(1,28,2);
until(invcount=0 or IsChatMessage(‘any more items in the bank.’));
if IsChatMessage(‘any more items in the bank.’) then writeln(‘Uhoh, you’‘re out of bank space!’);
end;
end;[/scar]

Read full topic

item.title: DepositAll script
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

Whoops. You still need one of the begins and ends:
[scar]procedure DepositAll;
begin
if (BankScreen) then
begin
fixchat;
repeat
Deposit(1,28,2);
until(invcount=0 or IsChatMessage(‘any more items in the bank.’))
if IsChatMessage(‘any more items in the bank.’) then writeln(‘Uhoh, you’‘re out of bank space!’)
end
end;[/scar]
Now, this is a good improvement on the current SRL deposit all, so what are the chances of it being included?

Read full topic

item.title: DepositAll script
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

This is really all you needed to do: [scar]procedure DepositAll;
begin
if (BankScreen) then
fixchat;
repeat
Deposit(1,28,2);
until(invcount=0 or IsChatMessage(‘any more items in the bank.’))
if IsChatMessage(‘any more items in the bank.’) then writeln(‘Uhoh, you’‘re out of bank space!’)
end;[/scar]

That’s just your cleaned up code.

item.title: DepositAll script
item.dc:creator: @m0u53m4t m0u53m4t
item.description:
@m0u53m4t wrote:

My own deposit all script, that really does deposit all, not just most like the old one.
[scar]procedure DepositAll;
begin
if (BankScreen) then
fixchat
begin
repeat
begin
Deposit(1,28,2)
end
until(invcount=0 or IsChatMessage(‘any more items in the bank.’))
end
if IsChatMessage(‘any more items in the bank.’) then writeln(‘Uhoh, youre out of bank space!’)
end;
[/scar]

Read full topic
